capture-filter
**************


Description
===========

A capture filter contains a set of *`rules <https://docs.cloud.oracle
.com/api/#/en/iaas/latest/datatypes/CaptureFilterRuleDetails>`__*
governing what traffic a *`VTAP
<https://docs.cloud.oracle.com/api/#/en/iaas/latest/Vtap>`__* mirrors.
The capture filter is created with no rules defined, and it must have
at least one rule for the VTAP to start mirroring traffic.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* get

* list

* update
